new_pswd_login: Login again with the new password!
pref_device_register_msg: Register device information to the Cloud
device_offline_message: Device is offline. The register values might not correct.
usb_logging: You can not change this setting since the USB logging is enabled. You must stop USB logging before you change any setting.
log_freq_too_small: The logging interval is too short. It will cause many duplicate data and mostly increase the number of data access in your storage device, which might shorten the life of your device. Are you sure to set this value?
serv_maint: The Cloud server is performing some maintenance at the moment. We\'ll be back online shortly!
serv_maint_503: The Cloud server is performing some maintenance at the moment. We\'ll be back online at
make_sure_delete_register:
Are you sure to delete this register?
Note:
If you enabled logging function, the data in Cloud will be removed. But the data in the USB drive will not be changed.
make_sure_delete_device:
Are you sure to delete this device?
Note:
If you enabled logging function, the data in Cloud will be removed. But the data in the USB drive will not be changed.
storage_capacity_hint: When the capacity of storage reaches 80 - 100.
ftp_cli_send_log_hint: Asking the device to send the log to the remote FTP Server
make_sure_send_log: Are you sure to send log now?
success_export: Success to export Modbus profile to
install_fm_hint: Please install a file manager before you import a Modbus profile
received_ftp_req: Device received the request. You can check the result in event log later.
no_received_ftp_req: Cloud server cannot forward the request since the device is offline.
dev_received_reboot_req: Device received the request. You can check the result in event log later.
dev_no_received_reboot_req: Cloud server cannot forward the request since the device is offline.</string>
make_sure_dev_reboot:
Are you sure you want to reboot the device firmware?
The reboot process will take approximately 2 to 5 minutes, and the device will be offline for a short period of time. Any app/cloud operations will not be processed during the time.
make_sure_fwupg:
Are you sure you want to upgrade the device firmware?
The updating process will take approximately 2 to 5 minutes, and the device will be offline for a short period of time. Any app/cloud operations will not be processed during the time.
received_fwupg_req:
The firmware upgrade command has been received and the result can be seen later in the event log.
Notes:
1. This function requires version 31 or higher
2. If the device firmware is not be updated after the device restarted. It might be the device cant download the firmware file now. Please try again later.
3. If the device fails to be online after 10 minutes, the firmware update may fail. Please contact the relevant engineers for help.
no_received_fwupg_req: Cloud server cannot forward the request since the device is offline.
stm32_upgrade_hint: Notice: It might destroy the device if the upgrade fails.
dup_reg_warning:
Note：
1. System prefers to use available Modbus addresses which are close to the register, therefore the successive of a duplicated 32 bits register cannot be guaranteed.
2. If there is no enough address for duplication, the system will stop the process once it reaches the upper limit.
cloud_different: The device and APP don\'t connect to the same Cloud Server, which means you won\'t see the device online even if you registered the device successfully. Would you like to change the server configuration of the device?
cloud_cnt_failed: Connecting to Cloud Server! If you keep seeing this message, please check your network settings!
error_happened: A few error have been noted, our engineers are looking into it.
err_net_loss_rate: The packet loss rate (to Cloud Server) is too high
err_net_loss_rate_back: The network quality (to Cloud Server) is back to normal
reach_register_limit: Reached the max number of registers
reach_group_limit: Reached the max number of groups
reach_group_member_limit: Reached the max number of group members
success_reset_password: A one-time password sent to your email. You have to change the password next you login .
err_msg_strong_password: A password is at least 6 characters long. (Including one uppercase letter, one uppercase letter, and alphanumeric characters.
err_msg_reset_pass_disallow: User is not allowed to reset password. Please contact your company administrator for further support.
err_msg_invalid_ip_range: IP address and gateway is not at same subnet
err_consecutive_addr: The high and low address is not consecutive. Please make sure the connected Modbus device is capable to support the settings. Continue to save?
err_msg_cant_same_value: On value and Off value can not be the same
err_dur_better_lt_log_freq: The duration of the button is better to larger than the logging frequency by two more seconds. If the duration is too close to the logging frequency, which may result in any actions of the button made will not be recorded.
limited_access_hint: Users can not access this register if their options has been cancelled.
err_no_logging_register: Can not enable since no any logging registers in the register list.
err_msg_max_string_exceeded: The string length exceeds the limitation !
few_alarm_left: The number of the available alarms will soon reach the max limit of a day. (Less than 6 times)
no_avaliable_alarm: The number of the available alarms reached the max limit of a day
no_cloud_logging_data: No any logging data on the Cloud
err_msg_dup_slvid: The Slave setting has been used

display_01_as_off_and_on: Show Off/On when the value is 0/1

display_01_as_ok_and_err: Show Normal/Failure when the value is 0/1

display_10_as_green_red: Green/Red LED when the value is 1/0
display_82_76_67_as_rlc: Show R/L/C when the value is 82/76/67

display_01_as_remote_onsite: Show Remote/OnSite when the value is 0/1

wronce_warning:
Note:
1. If the register can be written by multiple master devices, the value written by APP can not be guaranteed.
2. APP will still show the old value after updating. The new value will be displayed correctly until the device updated.
